mapper.sql: page_id, page_title, `sql`, result_titles, field_name, `method`, flag, create_time, user_dm
mapper.insert: insert into t_query_page (page_title, `sql`, result_titles, field_name, `method`, flag, create_time, user_dm) values (#{pageTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sql,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultTitles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userDm,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into t_query_page
page_title,
`sql`,
result_titles,
field_name,
`method`,
flag,
create_time,
user_dm,
#{pageTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sql,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{resultTitles,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{method,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},

#{userDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update t_query_page
page_title = #{pageTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`sql` = #{sql,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
result_titles = #{resultTitles,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
field_name = #{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`method` = #{method,jdbcType=INTEGER},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_dm = #{userDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where page_id = #{pageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_query_page set page_title = #{pageTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `sql` = #{sql,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result_titles = #{resultTitles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, field_name = #{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `method` = #{method,jdbcType=INTEGER}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_dm = #{userDm,jdbcType=INTEGER} where page_id = #{pageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from t_query_page p INNER JOIN t_query_catalog c where p.page_id = c.page_id and c.flag = 1 and p.page_id = #{pageId}
select * from t_query_catalog where flag = 1 and parent_id = #{catalogId}
select * from t_query_catalog where flag = 1 and catalog_id = #{catalogId}
